Text:
Thanks for all your uploads, especially the entire James Bond Set, just hope and wish that Skyfall will be released also in the same format (When it is released of course ;) ).

Can You upload Hellraiser and Puppet Master collection please 1080p BluRay rip? Don't know if all the Puppet Master movies were released on BluRay, but would really appreciate it if they're uploaded if they actually exist in such a format.

Thanks AGAIN!!
